mapper.insert: insert into postForum (postIdx, postForumTitle, postForumContents, memberIdx, categoryPostIdx) values (#{postIdx}, #{postForumTitle}, #{postForumContents}, #{memberIdx}, #{categoryPostIdx})
mapper.select: select f.postIdx, c.categoryPostName, f.postForumTitle, f.postForumContents, f.postForumRegDate, f.postForumEditDate, f.postForumHits, m.memberNickname, f.memberIdx from postForum as f join categoryPost as c on f.categoryPostIdx = c.categoryPostIdx join member as m on f.memberIdx = m.memberIdx join post as p on f.postIdx = p.postIdx where f.postIdx = #{postIdx}
mapper.update: update postForum set postForumTitle = #{postForumTitle}, postForumContents = #{postForumContents}, postForumEditDate = now() where postIdx = #{postIdx}
